alert.note: Alert for Beadle; Brule; Gregory; Jerauld (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 12 at 8:51PM MST until December 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TUESDAY TO 6 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Beadle, Gregory, Jerauld and Brule Counties. * WHEN...From noon Tuesday to 6 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...This will be a long duration event. Precipitation will mix with and change to snow Tuesday afternoon. Freezing drizzle will mix with snow Tuesday night before changing back to all snow on Wednesday. Winds will increase Wednesday afternoon producing area of blowing snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
